Reference

Object Initiation & Transformation

These functions generate the spata-object you will work with throughot this and other platforms.

Initiation

The initiation-functions create a spata-object from scratch.

initiateSpataObject_10X()

Initiate a spata-object from 10X Visium

initiateSpataObject_CountMtr()

Initiate a spata-object from a raw count matrix

initiateSpataObject_Examples()

Initiate a spata-object from example data sets

initiateSpataObject_ExprMtr()

Initiate spata object from scaled expression matrix

initiateSpataObject_MALDI()

Initiate a spata-object from MALDI Experiments

Transformation

The transform-functions ensure compatibility between different platforms.

transformSeuratToSpata()

Transform seurat-object to spata-object

transformSpataToCDS()

Transform spata-object to cell-data-set (Monocle3)

transformSpataToSeurat()

Transform spata-object to a seurat-object

Object Loading and Saving

Some handy functions that make saving and loading corresponding objects more convenient.

loadGeneSetDf()

Load gene set data.frame

loadGSDF()

Original load gene set data.frame

loadSpataObject() loadCorrespondingCDS() loadCorrespondingSeuratObject()

Load corresponding objects

saveGeneSetDf()

Save a gene set data.frame

saveSpataObject() saveCorrespondingCDS() saveCorrespondingSeuratObject()

Save corresponding objects

Object Subsetting

Create spata-objects from data subsets for more in depth analysis.

subsetBySegment_CountMtr() subsetByBarcodes_CountMtr() subsetBySegment_ExprMtr() subsetByBarcodes_ExprMtr()

Subset a spata-object

Object Manipulation

SPATA invites you to extract your analysis and to add the results of your analysis. Constant change of the objectâ€™s content is therefore inevitable. The following functions serve as handy, helping hands to add SPATA-extern content to the object without disturbing itâ€™s integrity regarding SPATA-intern processes.

Set content

The set-functions let you set the content of specific slots.

setActiveExpressionMatrix()

Denote the default expression matrix

setAutoencoderAssessment()

Set results of autoencoder assessment

setCoordsDf()

Set the coordinates

setCountMatrix() setDenoisedMatrix() setScaledMatrix()

Set data matrices

setDefaultInstructions() setDirectoryInstructions()

Set default instructions

setFeatureDf()

Set feature data.frame

setGeneSetDf()

Set the gene-set data.frame

setInitiationInfo()

Set initiation information

setPcaDf() setTsneDf() setUmapDf()

Set dimensional reductions data.frames

setSpCorResults()

Set results of spatial correlation analysis

Add content

The add-functions let you add content to the spata-object savely.

addAutoencoderSetUp()

Add the set up of a neural network

addExpressionMatrix()

Add an expression matrix

addFeatures()

Add a new feature

addGeneFeatures()

Add new gene features

addGeneMetaData()

Add gene meta data to the object

addGeneSet() addGeneSetsInteractive()

Add a new gene set

addSpCorCluster()

Add cluster results of spatial correlation results

Discard content

The discard-functions let you delete unwanted information savely.

discardExpressionMatrix()

Discard an expression matrix

discardFeatures()

Discard features

discardGeneFeatures()

Discard gene features

discardGenes()

Discard genes

discardGeneSets()

Discard gene sets

Create content interactively

The create-functions open an interactive application in which the content to be added needs to be created at first.

createSegmentation()

Spatial Segmentation

createTrajectories()

Spatial Trajectories

Adjust content

The adjust-functions let you adjust content of the spata-object without overwriting it in itâ€™s essence.

adjustDefaultInstructions() adjustDirectoryInstructions()

Adjust default instructions

adjustGeneSetDf()

Filter gene-set data.frame

Rename content

The rename-functions let you adjust the name of certain content with which you refer to it via arguments

renameFeatures()

Rename features

renameGroups() renameSegments()

Rename cluster/group names

Extract data

SPATA invites you to extract your analysis. get-functions let you access every imaginable aspect of information conveniently.

Dimensional Reduction and Spatial Coordinates

getCoordsDf() getSegmentDf()

Obtain spatial coordinates

getSegmentNames()

Obtain segment names

getDimRedDf() getPcaDf() getPcaMtr() getUmapDf() getTsneDf()

Obtain dimensional reduction data

Features

getFeatureNames()

Obtain feature names

getFeatureDf()

Obtain feature data

getFeatureValues()

Obtain unique categorical feature values

getFeatureVariables()

Obtain a feature variable

getGroupingOptions()

Obtain variable names that group the barcode spots

getGroupNames()

Obtain group names a grouping variable contains

Genes & Gene-sets

getGeneCounts()

Obtain total number of gene counts

getGeneDistMtr()

Obtain distance measurements of spatially correlated genes

getGeneFeatureNames()

Obtain feature names of the gene meta data

getGeneMetaData() getGeneMetaDf()

Obtain gene meta data

getGenes() getGenesInteractive()

Obtain gene names

getGeneSetDf()

Obtain gene set data.frame

getGeneSets() getGeneSetsInteractive()

Obtain gene set names

Data matrices

getBarcodes()

Obtain specific barcodes

getActiveMatrixName()

Obtain name of currently active expression matrix

getExpressionMatrix() getCountMatrix()

Obtain count and expression matrix

Spatial Trajectories

getTrajectoryComment(<spata>)

Obtain a trajectory comment

getTrajectoryComment()

Obtain a trajectory comment

getTrajectoryDf()

Obtain a summarized trajectory data.frame

getTrajectoryLength()

Obtain the length of a trajectory

getTrajectoryNames()

Obtain trajectory names

getTrajectoryObject()

Obtain trajectory object

Miscellaneous

getAutoencoderAssessment()

Obtain information about the optimal neural network set up

getAutoencoderSetUp()

Obtain information on neural network

getDeaOverview()

Obtain info on de-analysis storage

getDeaResultsDf() getDeaGenes()

Obtain de-analysis results

getDefaultInstructions() getDirectoryInstructions()

Obtain default argument inputs

getImage()

Obtain histology image

getInitiationInfo() getInitiationInput()

Obtain information about object initiation

getSampleNames()

Obtain sample names

getSpataDf()

Obtain a spata-data.frame

Information & Summaries

Some handy functions that quickly give you an overwiew about the spata-objectâ€™s content and the progress you have made.

printAutoencoderSummary()

Print autoencoder summary

printDeaOverview()

Print overview of all conducted de-analysis

printDefaultInstructions()

Print current default settings

printGeneSetOverview()

Print overview about the current gene sets

Join Information

These functions access the information of interest, perform additional customized computations and join it as additional variables to already existing data.frames in a tidy-data fashion.

joinWith() joinWithFeatures() joinWithGenes() joinWithGeneSets() joinWithVariables()

Join barcodes with additional variables

joinWithPca() joinWithTsne() joinWithUmap()

Join barcodes with additional variables

Analysis

Computationally heavy calculations

These functions perform calculations that might take some time. The results are stored inside the spata-object and can be obtained via get-functions.

computeGeneMetaData() computeGeneMetaData2()

Compute gene summary statistics

runAutoencoderAssessment() assessAutoencoderOptions()

Assessment of Neural Network Set Up

runAutoencoderDenoising()

Denoise expression matrix

runDeAnalysis()

Find differently expressed genes

runPca() runPca2()

Run Principal Component Analysis

runSpatialCorrelationAnalysis()

Initiate gene clustering analysis based on spatial patterns

runTsne() runTsne2()

Run t-Stochastic Neighbour Embedding

runUmap() runUmap2()

Run UMAP-Analysis

Trajectories

assessTrajectoryTrends() assessTrajectoryTrends2() assessTrajectoryTrendsCustomized() assessTrajectoryTrendsCustomized2()

Trajectory trend analysis

Miscellaneous

findMonocleClusters()

Cluster sample via monocle3

findNearestNeighbourClusters()

Cluster sample via nearest neighbour analysis

findSeuratClusters()

Cluster sample via Seurat

Process & Examine

filterDeaDf()

Postprocess de-analysis results

filterTrends() filterTrajectoryTrends()

Filter variables of a certain trend

examineClusterResults()

Examine clustering results

examineTrajectoryAssessment()

Examine trajectory-moddeling results

Visualization

The plot-family ist agains splitted in several subfamilies.

Surface Plots

Visualize the barcode-spots information with a spatial dimension.

plotSurface() plotSurface2() plotSurfaceInteractive()

Plot the surface of the sample

plotSurfaceAverage()

Plot several surface plots colored by gene averages

plotSurfaceComparison() plotSurfaceComparison2()

Plot several surface plots colored by numeric variables

plotSurfaceQuantiles()

Plot a surface plot colored by binned numeric variables

plotSegmentation()

Plot segmentation

Differential Expression Analysis

Visualize the results of differential expression nalysis

plotDeaGeneCount()

Plot the number of differently expressed genes of certain groups

plotDeaHeatmap()

Plot differentially expressed genes

plotDeaPvalues() plotDeaLogFC()

Plot the p-value and log fold change distribution of de-analysis results

plotDeaSummary()

Plot a summary of differential expression analysis results

Dimensional Reduction

Visualize the barcode spots in a reduced dimension fashion.

plotUmap() plotTsne() plotPca()

Plot dimensional reduction

plotPcaVariation()

Plot Pca Variation

Spatial Trajectories

Visualize the barcode-spots information with a directional dimension.

plotTrajectory()

Plot trajectory

plotTrajectoryFeatures() plotTrajectoryGenes() plotTrajectoryGeneSets()

Plot continuous trajectory dynamics in lineplots

plotTrajectoryFeaturesDiscrete()

Plot discrete trajectory dynamics

plotTrajectoryFit() plotTrajectoryFitCustomized()

Plot trajectory fit

plotTrajectoryHeatmap()

Plot trajectory expression dynamic in heatmap

Statistics

Visualize the distribution of variables across groups or the sample and perform statistical tests.

plotBarchart()

Plot distribution of discrete variables

plotBoxplot() plotDensityplot() plotHistogram() plotRidgeplot() plotViolinplot()

Plot numeric distribution and statistical tests

plotStatisticsInteractive()

Plot distribution of variables interactively

Miscellaneous

Visualize a variety of aspects.

plotGeneMetaData()

Plot gene meta data

plotFourStates() plotFourStates2()

Gene set state plot

plotScatterplot()

Plot numeric variables as a scatterplot
